step_data.thought: I have reviewed the key topics related to accessible images in the issue description. The points include the different types of images, the accessibility of informational images created during the COVID-19 pandemic, and the necessary elements to incorporate in designs for inclusivity. I will summarize these recommendations clearly for the user.
step_data.action: stop('Key recommendations for making images accessible include: 1. Understanding the types of images: decorative vs informative, actionable, emotional, simple, and complex. 2. Considering the accessibility of informational images created during the COVID-19 pandemic. 3. Incorporating essential image elements in designs for inclusivity.')
